result.description: A location-based social interaction platform designed to share updates, interact with posts, and explore nearby places. The app integrates Google Maps and offers a smooth and user-friendly experience.
result.title: Wherever App

contentItems.title: Map Integration
contentItems.description: Explore nearby places and interact with content via Google Maps. View your location and tagged posts directly on the map

contentItems.title: Search and Filter
contentItems.description: Filter posts by date range or distance (from 2,000m to 10,000m). Customize your search criteria easily with a slider.

contentItems.title: Post Creation and Interaction
contentItems.description: Create posts with timestamps, comments, and location tags. Like and comment on posts to engage with others. Google Maps integration for tagging and visualizing locations.

contentItems.title: User Profile
contentItems.description: Personalize your profile with a display name, account ID, and About Me section. Upload profile pictures and manage your gallery and favorites.'

contentItems.title: Notifications
contentItems.description: A dedicated inbox displays activity notifications (e.g., "liked image"). Notifications are sorted chronologically and include timestamps.
